name: Black Kray
description: '''Timothy O'Neal Mills''' (born February 23, 1994), better known by his stage names '''Black Kray''' and '''Sickboyrari''',{{Efn|name=often}} is an American rapper, producer, and songwriter known for his influence on the [[cloud rap]], [[emo rap]], and [[Tread rap|tread]] genres. He is a founding member of the [[Musical collective|hip-hop collective]] and [[Record label|label]] Goth Money Records{{efn|name=often|Often stylized in all uppercase.}} and an early member of [[Raider Klan]]. Mills has collaborated with many similar artists, including [[SpaceGhostPurrp]], [[Working on Dying]], [[Lil Yachty]], [[Bladee]], [[Yung Lean]], [[TeamSESH]], [[Thraxxhouse]], [[City Morgue]], [[Sematary]], [[Suicideboys|G59 Records]], Chxpo, DJ Kenn, and DJ Smokey. His music has been described as melodic, hazy, and ethereal. He is widely known as one of the most influential underground rappers.
